newsitem.title: AUSTRALIA: RTRS-MIM hit by strike at Oaky Creek coal.
newsitem.headline: RTRS-MIM hit by strike at Oaky Creek coal.

text.p: MIM Holdings Ltd said a strike over award conditions by workers at its Oaky Creek coal mine in north Queensland which began on Thursday will go before an Industrial Relations Commission hearing on Monday.

"We can confirm there is a strike (at Oaky Creek) which began yesterday and the matter will go before the Industrial Relations Commission on Monday," MIM general manager, public affairs, Collin Myers said.
Myers declined discuss reasons for the strike and officials of the Construction, Forestry, Mining and Energy Union, whose members work at Oaky Creek, were not immediately available.
The mine produces three million tonnes of coking coal a year, all of which is exported to Asia and Europe.
